message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to own a unique item that's worth a lot to you, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to its true worth to me. How about offering the product for $8000?

Bob, I understand you want to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $9500. This is the best price I can offer, but I think it's still a great value for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, how about we aim for $9000? I believe this strikes a fair balance between the value of the product and my budget.

Bob, I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I'd like to add a slight premium for the hassle of negotiating with me. How about we do $9250? I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $9000 without any additional premium. I believe this aligns better with the value I place on the product and my budget.
